## Vector2.toArray() method

Sets the Vector2 coordinates in the given array or FloatArray from the given index.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toArray(array: FloatArray, index?: number): Vector2;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>FloatArray</code> | defines the source array |
|  index | <code>number</code> | defines the offset in source array |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector2`

the current Vector2
